id.description: Variant ID, use this to specify the product when creating orders

catalog_product_id.description: ID of the product that this variant belongs to

name.example: Gildan 64000 Unisex Softstyle T-Shirt with Tear Away (Black / 2XL)

color_code.description: Hexadecimal RGB color code. May not exactly reflect the real-world color

color_code2.description: Secondary hexadecimal RGB color code. May not exactly reflect the real-world color

placement_dimensions.description: A list of placement configuration objects, each specifying the layout details for a particular placement.

placement.description: The name or type of the placement (e.g., "default").

height.description: The height dimension for the placement (in inches).

width.description: The width dimension for the placement (in inches).

orientation.description: The orientation of the placement, such as "vertical", "horizontal" or "any".

image.description: URL of a preview image for this variant

product_details.description: Link to details about the product
product_details.title: HateoasLink

product_variants.description: Link to a list of all catalog variants that are siblings of this catalog variant, relating to the same catalog product
product_variants.title: HateoasLink

variant_prices.description: Link to pricing information about this catalog variant
variant_prices.title: HateoasLink

variant_images.description: Link to images related to this variant and details about those images
variant_images.title: HateoasLink

variant_availability.description: Link to information about the availability of this variant
variant_availability.title: HateoasLink
